overview: 10 Hot girls just waiting to be in the music industry. Watch them all try to get there! Amanda is an up and coming singer from Romania and is promoting her new album in Bender's studio. Two nuns, Jasmine and Tarra, are looking for Ben Dover to assist them with a special request they have but instead they find two other colleagues that are willing to help Jasmine and Tarra with their needs. Girl duo Angelica and Britney have a new record and are at Ben's show to do some promoting. Christine is looking for some assistance from Ben for charity. Harvey and Rebecca are the admin girls at Bluebird Radio and recently have not been performing their task correctly, so Ben decides to punish them the only way he can think of. Cindy and Farrah are in a punk band making their way to Bluebird studio so that Ben can play their new record on the radio but Ben needs some convincing before he helps these girls.
tagline: Music is not the only thing they want to play with!
title: Radio Ravers
